data.text: @hgtv Home is sleek but somewhat lacking in the original's mid-century charm. Also, too much of the landscaping was ripped out.

@hgtv Great job, love the flooring in the living room and I've been looking for something similar for mine and haven’t found it. Could you tell me the name of the product, manufacturer and where you purchased it? Thanks
@hgtv Please give Tarek his own show!  So much more interesting than a bleached blonde with no design school degree.  So more interesting with Tarek that’s learned through experience on the job!

@hgtv Really confused as 2 why HGVT giving Christine her own show Has she got them on a contract where they honor something Give her a Web show So many other New shows coming w/o the attitude ego or nastiness Let her go play wth cars He'd b much better off

@hgtv Episode 14 when Christine bitching bc shes not designing Shes got NO sense on budgeting design nothing really Hes much better Her remark Now every1s a designer SHES NOT EITHER Shes a realtor that thinks shes great at At  things SHES NOT&HGTV giving her a show
@hgtv The original #FlipOrFlop  Tarrek&Christina are the best! They may not be good together but they ROCK AS DESIGNERS TOGETHER ❤️
@hgtv I really love this remodel, especially the wallpaper! ❤
@hgtv That kitchen was beautiful.  One of my favorite you two have done.
